trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authentication scheme to use to sign HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets the authentication scheme to use to sign HTTP requests.

trans-unit.source: This property is set only when Shared Key or Shared Key Lite credentials are used; it does not apply to authentication via a shared access signature or anonymous access.
trans-unit.target: This property is set only when Shared Key or Shared Key Lite credentials are used; it does not apply to authentication via a shared access signature or anonymous access.

trans-unit.source: Note that if you are using the legacy Table service API, which is based on WCF Data Services, the authentication scheme used by the <codeEntityReference>!:TableServiceContext</codeEntityReference> object will always be Shared Key Lite, regardless of the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Note that if you are using the legacy Table service API, which is based on WCF Data Services, the authentication scheme used by the <codeEntityReference>!:TableServiceContext</codeEntityReference> object will always be Shared Key Lite, regardless of the value of this property.
